title: Harrowed World: Portents In Red
description: Step into a shadowy and dangerous world where you are the monster. ‘Harrowed World: Portents In Red’ is an action RPG with a focus on story and atmosphere that allows you to create and develop your own vampire.
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Harrowed World: Portents In Red-1d2fk](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/65583fa3ef6a427ab9dc917ac638d216/harrowed-world-portents-in-red-1d2fk.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Step into a shadowy and dangerous world where you are the monster.

The statue of the Unnamed Martyr cries red with blood while chaos erupts across the Isle of Gallow. Once the dust is settled you are tasked with investigating the mysterious portents in red, while keeping your vampiric nature hidden from the unsuspecting mortals around you.

‘Harrowed World: Portents In Red’ is an action RPG with a focus on story and atmosphere that allows you to create and develop your own vampire, and discover the intricate web of power struggles and deadly rivalries that govern vampiric society.

Danger is everywhere, and trust is a rare commodity. Choose your allies and enemies well.

Good luck, vampire.

<!--image-->
![Harrowed World: Portents In Red-1p220](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/65583fa3ef6a427ab9dc917ac638d216/harrowed-world-portents-in-red-1p220.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
• Unleash your inner vampire with the detailed character creation system.

• Explore the darkly vibrant open world island map.

• Satisfy your need for blood by feeding on the human inhabitants.

• Employ supernatural powers to manipulate, control or harm those around you.

• Experience the immersive story and atmosphere with a mix of dark gothic and modern styling.

• Discover the various vampiric factions and choose your allegiance.

• Complete varied tasks designed to cater for different gameplay styles and encourage replayability.

• Gain XP from finishing tasks, rather than kill count.

• Pick dialogue choices with the potential to change the outcome of a task or alter your reputation with a particular faction.

<!--image-->
![Harrowed World: Portents In Red-c1mpd](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/65583fa3ef6a427ab9dc917ac638d216/harrowed-world-portents-in-red-c1mpd.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
A dark and twisted version of our world, where the supernatural exists just below the surface. Vampires, magical folk, and other beings exist in a constant struggle for power and influence. Through sinister cabals and insatiable corporate empires these creatures hold sway over human society.

<!--image-->
![Harrowed World: Portents In Red-1az6b](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/65583fa3ef6a427ab9dc917ac638d216/harrowed-world-portents-in-red-1az6b.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Ordinary people live in blissful ignorance of the dark forces at work around them. Follow these supernatural beings through a grim dystopian atmosphere filled with gothic horror and a tangled web of morality where peril lurks around every corner.
